title: Lost an S- Hextech thingie
body:
I had 1 for Zyra, got a second one, went to craft, and now it says I have only 1.

Help please?

replies.body: I got it all sorted out, thank you so much! I had to relog and it showed up after a following victory.
Hmm, yeah I see that you fused two tokens and blue essences successfully.  It shows that you've now unlocked Mastery level 6 for Zyra.  Is this still an issue?
